item.title: List Foreign key constrants defined in a database
item.description: tags Programming Code snippets Postgres Postgres View foreign key constrants defined in all databases select kcu.table_schema || '.' ||kcu.table_name as foreign_table, '>-' as rel, rel_tco.table_schema || '.' || rel_tco.table_name as primary_table, string_agg(kcu.column_name, ', ') as fk_columns, kcu.constraint_name from information_schema.table_constraints tco join information_schema.key_column_usage kcu on tco.constraint_schema = kcu.constraint_schema and tco.constraint_name = kcu.constraint_name join information_schema.referential_constraints rco on tco.constraint_schema = rco.constraint_schema and tco.constraint_name = rco.constraint_name join information_schema.table_constraints rel_tco on rco.unique_constraint_schema = rel_tco.
